chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
b: R
a: R
n: nat

Goal:
SF_lx (SF_inf_seq f a b n) = unif_part a b n

Premises:
SF_inf_seq = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (Inf_fct f) (unif_part a b n) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
unif_part = fun (a b : R) (n : nat) => mkseq (fun i : nat => a + INR i * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) (S (S n)) : R -> R -> nat -> seq R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
SF_sup_lx : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), SF_lx (SF_sup_seq f a b n) = unif_part a b n
ad_SF_val_fun : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (a <= b -> adapted_couple (SF_val_fun f a b n) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part a b n)) (seq2Rlist (SF_val_ly f a b n))) /\ (~ a <= b -> adapted_couple (SF_val_fun f b a n) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part b a n)) (seq2Rlist (SF_val_ly f b a n)))
SF_val_subdiv : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), subdivision (sf_SF_val_fun f a b n) = (if Rle_dec a b then seq2Rlist (unif_part a b n) else seq2Rlist (unif_part b a n))
unif_part_S : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), unif_part a b (S n) = a :: unif_part ((a * INR (S n) + b) / INR (S (S n))) b n
unif_part_bound : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), unif_part a b n = rev (unif_part b a n)
SF_sup_ly : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), SF_ly (SF_sup_seq f a b n) = behead (pairmap (Sup_fct f) 0 (unif_part a b n))
Riemann_fine_unif_part : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (forall a0 b0 : R, a0 <= b0 -> a0 <= f a0 b0 <= b0) -> a <= b -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) <= (b - a) / (INR n + 1) /\ pointed_subdiv (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) /\ SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) = a /\ last (SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) = b
SF_map_lx : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_map f0 s) = SF_lx s where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_lx_surj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, s = s0 -> SF_lx s = SF_lx s0 where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
Sup_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Lub_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Inf_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
SF_lx_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_cat x y) = SF_lx x ++ behead (SF_lx y) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_lx_cons : forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_cons h s) = fst h :: SF_lx s where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
unif_part_nat : forall (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R), a <= x <= b -> {i : nat | nth 0 (unif_part a b n) i <= x < nth 0 (unif_part a b n) (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size (unif_part a b n))%nat} + {nth 0 (unif_part a b n) n <= x <= nth 0 (unif_part a b n) (S n)}
SF_lx_nil : forall x0 : R, SF_lx (SF_nil x0) = [:: x0] where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
unif_part_sort : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), a <= b -> sorted Rle (unif_part a b n)
SF_lx_rev : forall s : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_rev s) = rev (SF_lx s) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_sup_seq = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
is_subdivision = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l : Rlist) => {l0 : Rlist & adapted_couple f a b l l0} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
SF_lx_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), (0 < size P)%nat -> SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = P where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_lx_f1 : forall (f1 : R -> ?T) (P : seq R), (0 < size P)%nat -> SF_lx (SF_seq_f1 f1 P) = P where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_val_fun = fun (T : Type) (f : R -> T) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R) => SF_fun_f2 (fun x0 y : R => f ((x0 + y) / 2)) (unif_part a b n) x : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> R -> R -> nat -> R -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope R_scope]
SF_lx_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (h : R * ?T), SF_lx (SF_rcons s h) = rcons (SF_lx s) (fst h) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
last_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), last x0 (unif_part a b n) = b
head_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), head x0 (unif_part a b n) = a
SF_seq_bij_lx : forall (lx : seq R) (ly : seq ?T) (Hs : size lx = S (size ly)), SF_lx (SF_make lx ly Hs) = lx where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
adapted_couple = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => ordered_Rlist l /\ pos_Rl l 0 = Rmin a b /\ pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = Rmax a b /\ Rlength l = S (Rlength lf) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq f (open_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (pos_Rl lf i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
SF_val_fun_rw : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R) (Hx : a <= x <= b), SF_val_fun f a b n x = match unif_part_nat a b n x Hx with | inleft H => f (a + (INR (proj1_sig H) + / 2) * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) | inright _ => f (a + (INR n + / 2) * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) end
sf_SF_val_fun : (R -> R) -> forall a b : R, nat -> StepFun a b
SF_map_cons : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_map f0 (SF_cons h s) = SF_cons (fst h, f0 (snd h)) (SF_map f0 s) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
subdivision : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
SF_val_ly = fun (T : Type) (f : R -> T) (a b : R) (n : nat) => behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => f ((x + y) / 2)) 0 (unif_part a b n)) : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> R -> R -> nat -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
SF_size_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_size (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = Init.Nat.pred (size P) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
SF_ly_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_ly (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = behead (pairmap f2 0 P) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_make : forall (lx : seq R) (ly : seq ?T), size lx = S (size ly) -> SF_seq where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_rev_0 : forall s : SF_seq, size (rev (SF_lx s)) = S (size (rev (SF_ly s))) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
seq_step_unif_part : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), seq_step (unif_part a b n) = Rabs ((b - a) / (INR n + 1))
SF_cons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), P s -> P (SF_cons h s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]

```coq
rewrite SF_inf_seq. rewrite SF_lx. rewrite unif_part. reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: rewrite SF_inf_seq. rewrite SF_lx. rewrite unif_part. reflexivity.
